title: Demonstrate Driver-Assist Features on Test Drive
description: During a test drive, a salesperson needs to safely demonstrate advanced driver-assist features like Lane Keeping Assist and Pre-Collision Assist.

tasks.description: Before the demonstration, explain to the customer what the feature does and what they should expect to see and feel.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the upcoming demonstration.

tasks.description: On a safe, appropriate road, activate the Lane Keeping Assist system.
Explain how the system provides steering assistance to help keep the vehicle in its lane, while reminding the customer to always keep their hands on the wheel.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a safe and effective demonstration of the feature.
